WSUS31 KKCI 220855 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 29E 
VALID UNTIL 1055Z 
PA WV OH 
FROM 40W EWC-20SE EKN-60W HNN-20ENE ROD-40W EWC 
AREA EMBD TS MOV FROM 20020KT. TOPS TO FL350. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 221055-221455 
AREA 1...FROM 30NE ERI-60SSW RIC-HMV-ROD-30NE ERI 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM ECG-170ESE ECG-130SE ILM-80S ILM-ECG 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.

AREA 1...FROM 30NE ERI-60SSW RIC-HMV-ROD-30NE ERI 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM ECG-170ESE ECG-130SE ILM-80S ILM-ECG 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
==
